derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English  burg, burh 'fortress, citadel', later 'fortified town', of Germanic origin; related to Dutch burg and German Burg. Compare with burgh

entry.tran: 自治市镇；（大城市中的）行政区
entry.def: A borough is a town, or a district within a large town, which has its own council.

example.ex: ...the New York City borough of Brooklyn.

means.word_mean: 1. one of the administrative divisions of a large city
2. an English town that forms the constituency of a member of Parliament
